alert.note: Alert for Boone; Dallas; Greene; Guthrie (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 15 at 5:33PM CST until December 15 at 6:00PM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN GREENE...NORTHEASTERN GUTHRIE...SOUTHWESTERN BOONE AND NORTHWESTERN DALLAS COUNTIES... At 533 PM CST, a confirmed tornado was located 7 miles south of Jefferson, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Perry, Guthrie Center, Panora, Lake Panorama, Grand Junction, Bagley, Rippey, Yale, Jamaica, Dawson, Bouton, Beaver, Berkley, Perry Municipal Airport, Lakin Slough Game Management Area and Springbrook State Park. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
